changes: Removed 'Heading' element and moved it to the text editor (Any existing heading element will be converted to text).
Added new flag-style icons for assets and the flag wrapper (same icons as on osu! web)
Added Define Costum Font Size feature (from 50 to 200)
Added BBCode Output Compression feature
Added emoji picker to the text editor
Added new tools to the text editor (YouTube, Profile, Assets, Lists)
Added functionality to rearrange canvas element menu buttons
Added preference option for auto-hide canvas menu
Added canvas auto-sync with the user's latest me! page
Added font style to the text editor
Added support for gradients in links
Fixed link form not showing when selecting a link
Fixed auto-save feature not working on mobile
Fixed text selection reset when clicking outside the text editor area
Fixed redundant generated links when a gradient is applied
Fixed Unicode (fancy text) incorrectly rendered when applied with gradients
Implemented the 'Clone from osu!' feature
Improved Image Map Editor (better resize handles, a new auto-snap feature, and a sticky 'Add Item' button
Improved Gradients (for a smoother transition from start to finish)
Added support to use Google Drive link in audio editor
Added support for custom colors in links
Added hotkeys for canvas actions
Added 2 new project templates
Added Element Group (to group canvas items)
Added new option to display the flag wrapper vertically
Bug fixes and code adjustments
Bug fixes and code adjustments
Bug fixes and code adjustments
Added option to hide canvas content while moving
Added support for moving selected canvas items
Added Undo/Redo functionality on Canvas
Added support for importing Image Maps from BBCode
Added Element Flags (for generating user links with flags)
Added 5 new project templates
Restored scroll position when returning to edit mode
Hid Canvas Element List while dragging a Canvas Item
Introduced new gradient types: Middle, Three-Channel, Rainbow, Random
Bug fixes and code adjustments
